Class CType

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds.ctypes.CType
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComplexType, Function, PrimitiveType, Ptr
public abstract class CType
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract super class of all C-Types.

This CType for convenience reason.

init

protected void init()
Override this method to init the CType, e.g. set enclosingType of your fields.

Since:
2008.b

getEnclosingType

public ComplexType getEnclosingType()
Returns the enclosing type of this CType. May be null if this variable has no enclosing type.

Returns:
The enclosing Type.
Since:
2008.b

setEnclosingType

protected void setEnclosingType(ComplexType enclosingType,
                                java.lang.String name)
Sets the reference to the enclosing type. The enclosing type is used to determine the assignment statement. This method is called from the enclosing type itself when exploring its children thus this method doesn't need to be public.

Parameters:
enclosingType - Reference of the enclosing type, or null
Since:
2008.b

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of this variable.

Returns:
Name of this variable.
Since:
2008.b

setName

protected void setName(java.lang.String name)
Sets the name of this variable. The name is calculated at runtime when exploring the enclosing type thus this method doesn't need to be public. To explicitly set the name pass it to the constructor.

Parameters:
name - A new name of this variable.
Since:
2008.b

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

setCompilerAbstraction

public CType setCompilerAbstraction(CompilerAbstraction compilerAbstraction)
Sets compiler abstraction to this CType.

Parameters:
compilerAbstraction - Compiler abstraction for this CType.
Returns:
This CType for convenience reason.
Since:

getCompilerAbstraction

public CompilerAbstraction getCompilerAbstraction()
Gets the compiler abstraction for this CType.

Returns:
The compiler abstraction for this CType or null.
